#summary Technologies.

= Core =

  * Lang: python
  * Web engine: flask
  * Templater: jinja2

  * DB: graph database (neo4j) or semaweb one (but need scheme editor)
  * Files: FS (XX/XX/XX/XX/filename.ext)
